messages.message: Incompatible PFrame with missing KTXanimData. Only animation sequences can have PFrames.
messages.details: There is a PFrame in a BasisLzEtc1sImageDesc but the KTXanimData is missing.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
